snippet: The Leucadia National Corporation, which has been likened to a "baby Berkshire Hathaway" because of its wide range of holdings, said Monday that it would buy the Jefferies Group, an investment banking firm.
abstract: The Leucadia National Corporation, which has been likened to a "baby Berkshire Hathaway" because of its wide range of holdings, said Monday that it would buy the Jefferies Group, an investment banking firm.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Leucadia to Buy Jefferies in $3.6 Billion Deal
